title.rendered: STEDI FORD RANGER & EVEREST LOWER GRILL LIGHT BAR MOUNTING BRACKET MK2

content.rendered:
Ford Ranger MK2 (PX2) & Everest 2015 to 2018 (UA) – No tech pack or located to the side of the grille.

For models fitted with the tech pack in the center, follow the drop-down boxes as there are additional components required.

ENGINEERED TO SUIT RANGER | EVEREST

Specifically designed to fit Ford Ranger MK2 (PX2) & Everest 2015 to current all sub models including XL, XLS, XLT, Wildtrak & FX4 | Trend, Ambiente & Titanium. Perfectly fits the STEDI ST3K 21.5″ Light Bar in the lower grille opening. This is the graceful & robust lower grill mount you’ve been waiting.

AFTERMARKET YET COHESIVE

The Everest & Ranger is one of few utes on the market that has an attractive front-end right out of the box. Every detail of lower grill mount has been carefully considered to ensure that depth & height remains cohesive with the overall front-end design. The end is result is a perfectly located light bar that strikes the ideal balance between aftermarket & original equipment vibe.

INTELLIGENT DESIGN BOLTS ON IN 25 MIN

We’ve spent the time designing and testing to ensure that the installation is fast & reliable. In fact, we expect a moderate DIY’er to nail this in 25 min.  No drilling, no cutting and no compromises.  Manufactured from 3mm thick powder coated stainless steel and folded in all the right places to ensure a vibration free install.

DETAILS

Designed to fit Ford Ranger MK2 (PX2) & Everest 2015 to 2018 (UA Chassis) all sub models including XL, XLS, XLT, Wildtrak & FX4 | Trend, Ambient, Titanium. Will also fit Ford Ranger Raptor and newer PX3 Ranger without radar box in the lower girll.

Ranger Raptor and PX3 (XLS only) require two holes to be drilled in the lower steel support as the pre-existing mounting holes are absent. 

Manufactured with 3mm Stainless Steel with satin powder coat, and designed to be fastened to pre-existing holes which are already present on the inner steel support. This is a completely non-intrusive install meaning that no new holes need to be made, nor do sections of the front bumper need any cutting or modifying.

The end result is a very robust, stealth installation.

Design is optimised to suit our STEDI ST3K-21.5″  LED Light Bar.

  • Black Powder Coated Finish
  • 3 Series Stainless Steel
  • Designed to minimise disruption of air-flow
  • No need to remove front bumper
  • Bolts to pre-existing holes
  • No drilling required, bolt and nut kit included

Price is for bracket only, light bars sold separately.

SPECIFICATIONS

MATERIAL 3 series Stainless Steel
FINISH Powder Coat

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x Set Ford Ranger / Everest Lower Grill Mounting Bracket
  • 2 x Stainess Steel Bolts
  • 2 x Flat Stainless Steel Washer
  • 2 x Nylock Nut

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI FORD RANGER & EVEREST LOWER GRILL LIGHT BAR MOUNTING BRACKET MK2

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
